summary: 1953  was a common year starting on Thursday.
full_text:
James Matthew Lee, PC  was the 26th Premier of Prince Edward Island . He was the leader of the PEI Progressive Conservative Party from 1981 to 1987.
Born in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island, the son of James Matthew Lee and Catherine Blanchard, Lee was educated at Saint Dunstan's University. He married Patricia Laurie in 1960.
^ "James Matthew Lee". Premiers Gallery. Government of Prince Edward Island. Retrieved 2009-05-26.
title: James Lee (Canadian politician)
